1.0.name: wordpress/tipsy-social-icons
1.0.description:
Tipsy Social Icons is a WordPress widget that makes it easy to include a variety of social icons and custom labels into your WordPress blog or site. It includes both 16x16 and 32x32 variations of the icons and optional hover effects.

Tipsy Social Icons allows you to:

  • Define a custom URL for each image
  • Easily customize each icons label
  • Modify the placement of the tooltip
  • ...and much more!

The plugin includes the following icons:

  • Behance
  • Deviant Art
  • Digg
  • Dribbble
  • Email
  • Evernote
  • Facebook
  • Flickr
  • Forrst
  • FourSquare
  • GitHub
  • Google+
  • Instagram
  • LastFM
  • LinkedIn
  • MixCloud
  • Picasa
  • Pinterest
  • Rdio
  • RSS
  • Skype
  • Soundcloud
